graphql.query:
query Query {
    getAddressTransfers(
    nativeFromAddresses: [],
    nativeToAddresses: [],
    tokenFromAddresses: [],
    tokenToAddresses: [],
    contractAddresses: ["0xdAC17F958D2ee523a2206206994597C13D831ec7"]
  )
    {
    blockHash
    blockNumber
    timestamp
    parentBlockHash
    tokenTransfers {
      amount
      blockNumber
      fromAddress
      toAddress
      transactionHash
      contractAddress
    }
    nativeTransfers {
      timestamp
      amount
      blockNumber
      fromAddress
      toAddress
      transactionHash
    }
  }
}

query Query {
    getAddressTransfers(
    fromAddresses: ["1qnJN7FViy3HZaxZK9tGAA71zxHSBeUweirKqCaox4t8GT7"],
    toAddresses: [""]
  )
    {
        blockHash
        blockNumber
        timestamp
        transfers {
        extrinsicHash
        module
        function
        isFinalized
        blockNumber
        fromAddress
        toAddress
        amount
        fee
        tip
        events {
            module
            function
            extrinsicHash
            extrinsicIdx
            blockNumber
            isTransferEvent
            attributes
        }
        }
        nonTransferExtrinsics {
        extrinsicHash
        module
        function
        isFinalized
        blockNumber
        events {
            module
            function
            extrinsicHash
            extrinsicIdx
            blockNumber
            isTransferEvent
            attributes
        }
        }
    }
}

query Query {
  latestBlock {
    blockHash
    blockNumber
    timestamp
    transfers {
      extrinsicHash
      module
      function
      isFinalized
      blockNumber
      fromAddress
      toAddress
      amount
      fee
      tip
      events {
        module
        function
        extrinsicHash
        extrinsicIdx
        blockNumber
        isTransferEvent
        attributes
      }
    }
    nonTransferExtrinsics {
      extrinsicHash
      module
      function
      isFinalized
      blockNumber
      events {
        module
        function
        extrinsicHash
        extrinsicIdx
        blockNumber
        isTransferEvent
        attributes
      }
    }
  }
}

query Query {
    getAddressTransfers(
    nativeFromAddresses: [],
    nativeToAddresses: ["0x4675C7e5BaAFBFFbca748158bEcBA61ef3b0a263"],
    tokenFromAddresses: [],
    tokenToAddresses: ["0x4dd91D9C5023af14bA65D2B77277335Bc133Ca5c"],
    contractAddresses: ["6p6xgHyF7AeE6TZkSmFsko444wqoP15icUSqi2jfGiPN"]
  )
   {
    blockHash
    blockHeight
    blockTime
    parentSlot
    previousBlockHash
    slot
    tokenTransfers {
      account
      action
      amount
      authority
      err
      fee
      fromAddress
      mint
      owner
      program
      programId
      rentSysvar
      signatures
      slot
      status
      toAddress
      transactionHash
      decimal
    }
    nativeTransfers {
      action
      amount
      err
      fee
      fromAddress
      programId
      signatures
      slot
      status
      toAddress
      transactionHash
    }
  }
}

query Query {
  latestLedger {
    ledgerSequence
    ledgerHash
    successfulTransactionCount
    failedTransactionCount
    operationCount
    previousHash
    timestamp
    transactions {
      ledgerSequence
      sourceAddress
      transactionHash
      memo
      fee
      isSuccessful
      sourceAccountSequence
      timestamp
      operations {
        ledgerSequence
        sourceAddress
        destinationAddress
        transactionHash
        amount
        timestamp
        fee
        assetType
        assetTypeIssuer
        createdAccount
        startingBalance
        type
      }
    }
  }
}

query Query {
    getAddressTransfers(
    fromAddresses: [],
    toAddresses: [],
    contractAddresses: ["EQCxE6mUtQJKFnGfaROTKOt1lZbDiiX1kCixRv7Nw2Id_sDs"]
  )
   {
    seqno
    shard
    workchain
    rootHash
    fileHash
    transactions {
      isAborted
      isDestroyed
      transactionHash
      blockSeqNumber
      blockWorkchain
      blockShard
      account
      fee
      timestamp
      isTokenTransfer
      contractAddress
      inMessage {
        source
        destination
        amount
        opcode
        blockSeqNumber
        transactionHash
        hash
        comment
      }
      outMessage {
        source
        destination
        amount
        opcode
        blockSeqNumber
        transactionHash
        hash
        comment
      }
    }
  }
}
